name: the Destinarian
description:
Seven years ago, the nobles of the three small islands united under a single banner and assembled in the army of the man they, themselves, proclaimed their King to repel the invasion of the mainland emperor. After their victory, the nobles crowned the King in the Capital's Castle Temple, and for a time thereafter the kingdom enjoyed the peace and prosperity of a state guided by consensus and natural justice.

Eventually, however, the strain of his nobles' competing interests took their toll on the King. He spent more time in retreat and less time with his advisors. On an otherwise ordinary day, the King went into the Temple to meditate, and has not been seen since. His Chancellor, Lord Pompton, has been his only contact with the outside world, and all but rules in the King's stead. The other nobles are gravely concerned, and the kingdom now teeters on the brink of dissolution...

You, the Destinarian, are the kingdom's best hope for securing the throne once again for the King and his loyal subjects. Travel throughout the counties of the kingdom to liberate their captive nobles and build a coalition to defeat Lord Pompton. With the help of Laura Beckett and your allies in the Castle, you may yet fulfill your destiny...

Compatible with most 4-button, 2-knob gamepad controllers. See the screenshots to the right for a diagram of game controls.

When you make your purchase, Itch.io will allow you to request a product key on the purchase page. You must obtain a product key to validate your copy of the game. Your key will be valid for up to three installations.
